title: Uriah Heep-Wake The Sleeper (2008)+Covers-OnlyMe1
description:
Uriah Heep-Wake The Sleeper (2008)+Covers-OnlyMe1

Universal Music has announced the release of a new studio album from 

British rock legends URIAH HEEP in June 2008.

Wake The Sleeper will be URIAH HEEP&#039;s first studio album in almost 

10 years (the first since 1998&#039;s "Sonic Origami") and is set to 

herald an exciting new phase for the band. The album sees URIAH HEEP 

back to their very best and is set to become a future classic, sure 

to please their dedicated worldwide fan base and fans of progressive 

rock in general.
In the words of Mick Box, "We are delighted to be reunited with a 

major label in Universal music".

&#039;Wake The Sleeper&#039; is an album we are incredibly proud of, and one 

that we hope the fans will see as one of URIAH HEEP&#039;s best. We can&#039;t 

wait to get back out on the road to showcase the new songs.

The live arena has been vital to the longevity of URIAH HEEP.

This is the band&#039;s first album without their long-standing and 

original drummer Lee Kerslake who sadly had to leave the band due to 

ill health in January 2007. Filling the drum stool for the very 

first time is the hugely well-respected Russell Gilbrook.

Current band lineup is:

Mick Box - Guitar, Vocals
Trevor Bolder - Bass, Vocals
Phil Lanzon - Keyboards, Vocals
Bernie Shaw - Lead Vocals
Russell Gilbrook - Drums, Vocals


01.Wake the Sleeper		03:33
02.Overload			05:58
03.Tears of the World		04:45
04.Light of A Thousand Stars	03:57
05.Heavens Rain			04:16
06.Book of Lies			04:05
07.What Kind of God		06:37
08.Ghost of the Ocean		03:22
09.Angels Walk with You		05:24
10.Shadow			03:35
11.War Child			05:07


Total Playtime:			50:45

Covers

Wake The Sleeper (2008) back
Wake The Sleeper (2008) front
Wake The Sleeper (2008) cd
Wake The Sleeper (2008) booklet
